DOC.brief_summary: Patients with uveal malignatnt melanoma with liver metastases have a dismal prognosis with a median survival of less than 12 months. There is noe established treatment showing increased overall survival. In this study we will determin if liver transplantation will result in long term survival in patients with liver only metastases from uveal malignant melanoma.
DOC.brief_title: Liver Transplantation and Uveal Malignant Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Uveal malignant melanoma, liver only metastases, ECOG 01 Extra hepatic disease, previous other maligency, previous organ transplantation
